feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • remove QA core by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13387
  • Type frontend field types by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13391
  • upgrading posthog-js to support surveys by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13392
  • Change the way we manage testcontainers by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13359
  • [Fix] Devtools crashing app preview by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13396

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.15...2.22.16

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Import/export attachment does not work by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13404
  • Remove pg mock. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13341
  • Fixing BB_ADMIN environment variable user creation by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13415

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.16...2.22.17

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix race condition when running screen load actions by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13394
  • Correct types accepted / returned through the view API. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13424
  • Fix ViewV2API.get to hit the API instead of using the sdk. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13425
  • [BUDI-8091] Fix renaming columns in SQL Server (and MySQL) by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13419
  • Data provider auto-refresh by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13182
  • Allow component deselect in preview. Remove screen highlight. by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13291
  • SQS Plumbing by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13406
  • Feature/nps survey by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13423

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.18...2.22.19

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Clean and populate url for single attachment by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13397
  • Remove test container logs by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13430
  • [BUDI-7659] First end-to-end test for SQS functionality. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13432
  • Tests and handle imports by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13408
  • Handle singleattachment on AttachmentCleanup by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13407
  • Builder bug fixes by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13431
  • Add more search tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13435
  • Unify icons usage in builder by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13444
  • Add number and date search tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13445
  • Single attachment column type by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13399

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.19...2.23.0
